bilingual.source: The new sports facility will open next month.
bilingual.target: 新的体育设施将于下个月开放。

bilingual.source: The equipment was housed in a secure facility.
bilingual.target: 设备被安置在一个安全的设施中。

bilingual.source: The company invested in a new manufacturing facility.
bilingual.target: 公司投资了一个新的制造设施。

bilingual.source: The library offers a study facility for students.
bilingual.target: 图书馆为学生提供了一个学习设施。

bilingual.source: The school has a well-equipped gymnastic facility.
bilingual.target: 学校有一个设备齐全的体操的设施。

bilingual.source: The team is responsible for daily operations of the facility.
bilingual.target: 团队负责设施的日常操作。

bilingual.source: A delegation of scientists visited the research facility.
bilingual.target: 一代表团科学家参观了研究设施。

bilingual.source: The preservice orientation includes a tour of the facility.
bilingual.target: 预备服务培训包括对设施的参观。

bilingual.source: Our community center has built a new recreation facility.
bilingual.target: 我们的社区中心新建了一个游乐设施。

bilingual.source: The storage facility has a capacity of 1,000 mcf.
bilingual.target: 这个储存设施的容量为1000每千立方英尺。

yingyinNormal.en: The Facility's name is, Chernobyl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这栋设施的名字是切尔诺贝利。

yingyinNormal.en: You run a whorehouse, not an orbital launch facility. Fine. I'd like to make some changes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你经营的是妓院，不是轨道发射设施。好吧，我想要做一些更改。

yingyinNormal.en: This entire facility's a centrifuge. Some kind of vehicle. A space station? Both. Plan A.
yingyinNormal.zh: 整个设施就是个大型离心机，是运输工具，还是空间站？都是，这是A计划。

yingyinNormal.en: My facility is off-site. I'll take them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的研究机构不在编制内，我带他们走。

yingyinNormal.en: Explain to me how you found this facility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 解释一下你是怎么找到这里的？

yingyinNormal.en: It's not easy to successfully infiltrate an Avengers facility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要潜进复仇者联盟的基地可不是件容易的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Welcome to my facility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 欢迎来到我的基地。

yingyinNormal.en: So we're gonna take all our R&D, we're moving it to our China facility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要把所有研发都移到中国的厂房。

yingyinNormal.en: The facility is hidden beneath the local power plant under military guard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个设备被藏在本地发电厂的地底，周围有军队守卫。

yingyinNormal.en: Mama is an old intriguer. She will use tears or terror with equal facility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈妈最会老谋深算，她会软硬兼施的。

yingyinNormal.en: Dave needs to appear casual as he is transferred from his room to the broadcast facility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 戴夫在从房间去直播室的时候要保持平静。

yingyinNormal.en: There in the heart of Panem's steepest mountain range lies the Capitol's principal military facility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那里是帕纳姆最为险峻的所在，那里有国会区重要的军事基地。

yingyinNormal.en: One of his agents stole it hoping to blackmail him. He kept it in a secure computer facility for safe keeping.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个特工偷走了账册，并试图敲诈他，他把账册放在一个戒备森严的电脑设备里。

yingyinNormal.en: What is this place? It's a remote diagnostic facility. Ford and his partner used them when the park was in beta.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么地方？这里是用来做远程诊断的，在乐园测试阶段，福特和他搭档用过。

yingyinNormal.en: Good God, the government couldn't afford this kind of facility. No, it was benefactors mostly, from the private sector.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，政府哪有钱盖这种大楼，大部分还得靠私营企业捐助。

yingyinNormal.en: Her final destination is Everett terminal. Frank Katulak manages the facility, keeping Boston fully supplied with natural gas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最终目的地是埃弗雷特码头，弗兰克·卡特拉克管理，这些设备使波士顿的天然气供给充足。

yingyinNormal.en: The modern feedlot business is really an extension of the corn business. Explaining the connection is facility manager Mike Thoren.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现代的饲养产业是玉米产业的一个延伸。正在向我们解说的是工厂的经理，麦克·瑟伦。

yingyinNormal.en: And here is what he's so excited about. It's America's newest auto plant, a billion-dollar state-of-the-art facility filled with all of the latest technology.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是他非常兴奋的一点，这是美国最先进的汽车化计划，价值大约十亿，配备了最先进的科技成果。

yingyinNormal.en: And right there in the little triple intersection is your ideal mate. Odds are she's a short physicist with low self esteem who lives in a government research facility in China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而你的理想伴侣只能从这三者之间小小的交集中找了。而你的那个她可能是个又矮又自卑的物理学家，还是在为中国政府研究所工作。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't do it on our own, you know. The margin on milk is always kind of tight, and in order to build the facility that's needed to capture all this methane and turn it into electricity, it requires a huge capital investment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们靠一己之力是做不了的，牛奶行业的利润总是不怎么高，而且改进设备来获得全部的这些沼气，然后把它们变成电力这是一笔巨大的投资。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 设施; 专用场所; 专门机构; 组织
服务(项目); 特殊功能

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 设施；专用场所；才能；天赋；流畅；灵巧；娴熟；服务；特殊功能；方便设施

sense_info_list.en: space or equipment necessary for doing something; an establishment set up to fulfil a particular function or provide a particular service, typically an industrial or medical one
sense_info_list.zh: 设施; 专用场所; 专门机构; 组织

examination_example.sentence: A "town of culture" could be not just about the arts but about honouring a town's peculiarities — supporting local <highlight>facilities</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “文化之城”不仅关乎艺术，还关乎尊重一个小镇的特色——支持当地设施。

examination_example.sentence: My own hospital system has banned sugary drinks from its <highlight>facilities</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我自己的医院系统已经禁止含糖饮料进入其设施。

sense_info_list.zh: 服务(项目); 特殊功能

exam_freq_info.chinese: 场所; 装置; 设备

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 设施；专用场所；才能；天赋；流畅；灵巧；娴熟；服务；特殊功能；方便设施

examination_example.sentence: Tennessee's technical and community colleges will not outsource (外包) management of their <highlight>facilities</highlight> to a private company.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 田纳西州的技术社区学院不会将其设施管理外包给一家私企。

sense_info_list.en: a place, amenity, or piece of equipment provided for a particular purpose
sense_info_list.zh: 场所; 装置; 设备

examination_example.sentence: One only has to look at the remarkable arts <highlight>facilities</highlight> at Britain's top private schools to comprehend this.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要看看英国顶级私立学校卓越的艺术设施，就能明白这一点。

sense_info_list.en: an option or service that gives the opportunity to do or benefit from something

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 设施；专用场所；才能；天赋；流畅；灵巧；娴熟；服务；特殊功能；方便设施

sense_info_list.en: a place; amenity; or piece of equipment provided for a particular purpose
sense_info_list.zh: 场所; 装置; 设备

examination_example.sentence: How a resident feels depends on an interaction between themselves and the care <highlight>facility</highlight> they live in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 病人的感受取决于他们自己和他们居住的护理机构之间的互动。

examination_example.sentence: It also has a special innovation <highlight>facility</highlight> for its employees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它还为员工提供了一个特殊的创新基地。

examination_example.sentence: What kind of care <highlight>facility</highlight> old people live in may be less important than we think.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老年人住在什么样的护理场所可能没有我们想象的那么重要。

examination_example.sentence: Work together with companies to improve their teaching <highlight>facilities</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与公司合作，改善教学设施。

examination_example.sentence: As a matter of fact, consumers expressed higher satisfaction with the one-star <highlight>facilities</highlight>, the lowest rated, than with the five-star ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，消费者对评级最低的一星级设施的满意度高于五星级设施。

examination_example.sentence: Whether adequate investment is being made to improve airport <highlight>facilities</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是否有足够的投资以改善机场设施。

examination_example.sentence: May have greater <highlight>facility</highlight> in abstract reasoning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在抽象推理方面有更强的能力。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示"…状态, 性质"

exam_freq_info.chinese: 设施; 场所; 装备

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 设施；专用场所；才能；天赋；流畅；灵巧；娴熟；服务；特殊功能；方便设施

sense_info_list.zh: 设施; 场所; 装备

examination_example.sentence: Participating in such events is a great way to learn about school <highlight>facilities</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参加这样的活动是了解学校设施的好方法。

examination_example.sentence: To see how many <highlight>facilities</highlight> they can use.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看看他们能使用多少设施。
带上你自己的露营设施。
